contents.zh-CHS: 下表显示了单级输出应用（“DT”、“MS”和“DO”包）中媒体网关（MG）和交换电路网络（SCN）之间的一些交互作用：

contents.text: Table 14 SCN Sequencing during Call Setup (single stage outpulsing)
contents.zh-CHS: 表14呼叫设置期间的SCN排序（单级输出）

contents.text: Call setup signal example for this case (MF signaling):
contents.zh-CHS: 这种情况下的呼叫设置信号示例（MF信令）：

contents.text: The "MO" and "MD" packages involve multi-stage signaling and multiple parameters. In the case of the "MD" package the following table shows some of the interactions:
contents.zh-CHS: “MO”和“MD”包涉及多级信令和多个参数。对于“MD”包，下表显示了一些交互：

contents.text: Table 15 SCN Sequencing during Call Setup (EANA and EAIN)
contents.zh-CHS: 表15呼叫设置期间的SCN排序（EANA和EAIN）

contents.text: The last example is an overlapped sending example where the address value would be sent later using the "inf" signal.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后一个示例是重叠发送示例，稍后将使用“inf”信号发送地址值。

contents.text: An example setup:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例设置：

contents.text: In all of the above cases, the "ans" event is an indication of off-hook from the far end (the other end answered). However, in the case of the operator service signaling (OSS) protocol of Feature Group D - shown in the following table, off-hook from the operator is part of the protocol (a request for the calling number) so that "ans" in this case does not indicate that the operator answered (only that off-hook/request for calling number was received).
contents.zh-CHS: 在上述所有情况下，“ans”事件表示从远端（另一端应答）脱钩。然而，在下表所示的功能组D的运营商服务信令（OSS）协议的情况下，来自运营商的摘机是协议的一部分（呼叫号码请求），因此在这种情况下，“ans”并不表示运营商应答（仅接收到摘机/呼叫号码请求）。

contents.text: Table 16 SCN Sequencing during Call Setup OSS Protocol ("MO" Package)
contents.zh-CHS: 表16呼叫设置期间的SCN排序OSS协议（“MO”包）

contents.text: Incoming Call Setup: A "sup" event is used to indicate when an incoming call arrives (corresponding to the incoming off-hook event). The event is provided without parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 来电设置：“sup”事件用于指示来电何时到达（对应于来电摘机事件）。提供的事件没有参数。

contents.text: Suspend call (sus; P + BR; DT,MD,MS,MO): Suspend ("sus") is an on-hook event that is an indication that the called party went on-hook.
contents.zh-CHS: 挂起呼叫（Suspend call，P+BR；DT，MD，MS，MO）：挂起（“Suspend”）是一个挂机事件，表示被叫方挂机。

contents.text: An on-hook event will be "notified" to a Call Agent as a "sus" event for interfaces that use the "MS", "DT" and "MD" packages from an endpoint at a terminating end of a call (as compared to a "rel" event from the originating side). The "sus" event from the terminating endpoint gives the Call Agent the option of doing "suspend/resume" processing or to simply release the call.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于使用来自呼叫终止端的端点的“MS”、“DT”和“MD”包的接口，挂机事件将作为“sus”事件“通知”呼叫代理（与来自发起端的“rel”事件相比）。来自终止端点的“sus”事件使呼叫代理可以选择执行“挂起/恢复”处理或简单地释放呼叫。

contents.text: The "sus" signal may be used to send an on-hook to the originating party without releasing the resources associated with the telephony leg of the call. The "rel" signal on the other hand would send an on-hook and release the resources associated with the call.
contents.zh-CHS: “sus”信号可用于向发起方发送挂机，而不释放与呼叫的电话分支相关联的资源。另一方面，“rel”信号将发送挂机并释放与调用相关的资源。

contents.text: Because of this "sus" can be followed by "res" (off-hook) and allow the call to resume, while "rel" cannot be followed by "res" because the call no longer exists.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，“sus”后面可以跟“res”（摘机）并允许继续调用，而“rel”后面不能跟“res”，因为调用已不存在。

contents.text: For E911 ("MO" package), the operator is normally in control of releasing the call so that, "sus" (on-hook), "res" (off-hook) and "rcl" (flash-hook) can be used to pass user hook events to the operator without releasing the call.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于E911（“MO”包），操作员通常可以控制释放呼叫，以便在不释放呼叫的情况下使用“sus”（挂机）、“res”（摘机）和“rcl”（闪存挂机）将用户挂机事件传递给操作员。

contents.text: Start Wink (swk; x + - MD,MO):. An Call Agent can optionally request the MG to notify it when the wink start signal occurs. Note that wink start ("swk") cannot be applied by the Call Agent as a signal. The occurrence of wink-start on an incoming trunk is a reflexive action that does not require Call Agent involvement.
contents.zh-CHS: 开始眨眼（swk；x+-MD，MO）：。呼叫代理可以选择请求MG在wink start信号出现时通知它。请注意，呼叫代理无法将wink start（“swk”）作为信号应用。在传入中继上出现wink start是一种反射动作，不需要呼叫代理参与。

contents.text: 3.0. Hook-State Signals and Events
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0. 钩子状态信号和事件

contents.text: 3.1. Overview of Approach
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. 方法概述

contents.text: As mentioned in the introduction, a higher level view is taken for on-hook and off-hook events for many of the CAS packages to make the interface Q.931-like. This provides the advantage that:
contents.zh-CHS: 正如引言中提到的，对于许多CAS包，采用了更高级别的视图来查看挂机事件和摘机事件，以使接口类似于Q.931。这提供了以下优点：

contents.text: * Similar call flows result as when dealing with Q.931-based interfaces (e.g., PRI) * It's more evident (for ease in debug) when looking at message as to exactly what is going on without having to refer to previous flows.
contents.zh-CHS: * 处理基于Q.931的接口（例如PRI）时会产生类似的调用流*在查看消息时，不必参考以前的流，更明显（为了便于调试）。

contents.text: This does require that media gateways maintain some state but this is a relatively small price to pay.
contents.zh-CHS: 这确实要求媒体网关保持某种状态，但这是一个相对较小的代价。

contents.text: One example of this is the "sup" signal which involves sending off-hook followed by digits as a high level signal. The "ans" event is also used to represent off-hook but from the terminating end at the point where the call is answered.
contents.zh-CHS: 这方面的一个例子是“sup”信号，该信号包括发送下钩信号，后跟数字作为高电平信号。“ans”事件也用于表示摘机，但从应答呼叫的终端开始。

contents.text: 3.2. Suspend/Resume Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 暂停/恢复处理

contents.text: Other signals and events "sus" for suspend, "res" for resume and "rel" for release are based on the concept that one end (the originator) is in control of the call. If the controlling end goes on-hook a "rel" is notified to the Call Agent, and results in a the call being released. However, if the non-controlling (terminating) end goes on-hook, a "sus" event occurs (instead of the "rel" event). This gives the Call Agent the option of doing suspend/resume processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他信号和事件“sus”表示暂停，“res”表示恢复，“rel”表示释放，它们基于一端（发起者）控制呼叫的概念。如果控制端挂机，“rel”将通知呼叫代理，并导致呼叫被释放。但是，如果非控制（终止）端挂机，则会发生“sus”事件（而不是“rel”事件）。这使呼叫代理可以选择执行挂起/恢复处理。

contents.text: If the Call Agent decides not to do suspend/resume processing, it can simply send "rel" and delete connection commands to the endpoints after it receives "sus" from the non-controlling (terminating) end of the call.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果呼叫代理决定不执行挂起/恢复处理，则在从呼叫的非控制（终止）端接收到“sus”后，它可以简单地向端点发送“rel”和“delete”连接命令。

contents.text: On the other hand, if it decides to do suspend/resume processing, it can start a timeout when it receives the "sus" event from the non-controlling (terminating) end of the call and continue the call if it receives a "res" (off-hook) event. It also has the option of propagating the "sus" and "res" as signals back to the ingress gateway and allow it an opportunity to release the call ("rel" event) or not. In any case the use of "sus" and "res" signals give another level of control over the "rel" signal which will not only send on-hook but also release the resources associated with the telephony leg of the call.
contents.zh-CHS: 另一方面，如果它决定执行挂起/恢复处理，它可以在从调用的非控制（终止）端接收到“sus”事件时启动超时，并在接收到“res”（摘机）事件时继续调用。它还可以选择将“sus”和“res”作为信号传回入口网关，并允许其有机会释放呼叫（“rel”事件）或不释放呼叫。在任何情况下，“sus”和“res”信号的使用给予了对“rel”信号的另一级控制，该信号将不仅在hook上发送，而且释放与呼叫的电话分支相关的资源。

contents.text: 3.3. Control over Disconnect for E911
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 控制E911的断开连接

contents.text: Note that for E911 (the "MO" package) is a special case in that the operator (terminating end) is always the controlling end. The "sus" and "res" signals are used to pass user hook state forward to the operator. The "rel" event is passed back as a notify to the Call Agent when on-hook is received from the operator indicating that the Call should be released. If the "rel" is not received the call should continue to stay up.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，对于E911（“MO”组件）是一种特殊情况，因为操作员（终端）始终是控制端。“sus”和“res”信号用于将用户挂钩状态转发给操作员。“rel”事件在从操作员处接收到挂机指示应释放呼叫时作为通知传回呼叫代理。如果没有收到“rel”，则应继续保持通话状态。

contents.text: 3.3. Release and Release Complete
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 发布和发布完成

contents.text: The "rel" signal/event generally means on-hook but more that that it also indicates "release of resources" for the telephony leg of the call. If a Call Agent sends a "rel" signal instead of "sus" it is requesting the call to be abandoned (i.e., "rel" cannot be followed by "res").
contents.zh-CHS: “rel”信号/事件通常意味着挂机，但更重要的是，它还表示呼叫的电话分支的“资源释放”。如果呼叫代理发送一个“rel”信号而不是“sus”，则它请求放弃呼叫（即，“rel”后面不能跟“res”）。

contents.text: The "rel" signal does not also imply that connections should be deleted so that to completely release the call including connections would require a DLCX in addition to (or conjunction with) the signal "rel".
contents.zh-CHS: “rel”信号并不意味着应删除连接，以便在“rel”信号之外（或与之结合）还需要DLCX来完全释放包括连接在内的呼叫。

contents.text: In addition to being a signal, "rel" can also be an event triggered by either:
contents.zh-CHS: 除了作为一个信号，“rel”还可以是由以下任一项触发的事件：

contents.text: * An on-hook from the controlling end of the call, or
contents.zh-CHS: * 来自呼叫控制端的挂机，或

contents.text: * Some abnormal event within the media gateway such that the telephony leg of the call can no longer be maintained.
contents.zh-CHS: * 媒体网关内的一些异常事件，导致呼叫的电话分支无法再维持。

contents.text: In any case, "rel" (release) is generally followed by an "rlc" (release complete). The release complete signal/event indicates that the trunk resources are now completely released and available for another call. This is also an event state that can be audited as indicated by the "S" in the column for that event (allowing the Call Agent to check to see if that trunk is released and available).
contents.zh-CHS: 在任何情况下，“rel”（release）后面通常跟着“rlc”（release complete）。release complete（释放完成）信号/事件表示中继资源现在已完全释放，可用于另一个呼叫。这也是一个事件状态，可以按照该事件列中的“S”指示进行审核（允许呼叫代理检查该中继是否已释放且可用）。

contents.text: Examples of the use of "rel" and "rlc":
contents.zh-CHS: 使用“rel”和“rlc”的示例：

contents.text: * Call Agent sends a "rel" to release a trunk, resulting in an outgoing off-hook being sent for that trunk. When the media gateway receives the on-hook from the other end, it returns an "rlc" event indicating that the trunk is released and available. * The media gateway receives a on-hook from the trunk at the controlling end of the call, resulting in a "rel" event being sent to the Call Agent. The Call Agent then sends an "rlc" to the media gateway, resulting in on-hook being sent in the opposite direction. * An "rel" event is sent to the Call Agent in the event of some abnormal condition in which the media gateway is unable to sustain the telephony leg of the call (e.g., glare condition). The Call Agent sends an "rlc" to the gateway to complete the release of the call. (note that "rlc may not correspond to on-hook but is generally sent anyway in response to a "rel".) * The Call Agent can send a "rel" (instead of "sus") signal to the controlling (originating) end of the call to abandon the call. The gateway will return with "rlc" when an off-hook has been received from the other end and all the resources have been released. * A "rel" can be sent on one-way incoming trunk to release a block ("bl") sent earlier.
contents.zh-CHS: * 呼叫代理发送一个“rel”来释放一个中继，从而为该中继发送一个传出的挂机。当媒体网关从另一端接收到挂机时，它返回一个“rlc”事件，指示中继已释放且可用。*媒体网关从呼叫控制端的中继接收挂机，导致“rel”事件被发送到呼叫代理。然后，呼叫代理向媒体网关发送“rlc”，导致挂机以相反方向发送。*在媒体网关无法维持呼叫的电话分支的某些异常情况下（例如眩光情况），向呼叫代理发送“rel”事件。呼叫代理向网关发送“rlc”以完成呼叫的释放。（请注意，“rlc可能不对应于挂机，但通常是响应“rel”而发送的）*呼叫代理可以向呼叫的控制（发起）端发送“rel”（而不是“sus”）信号以放弃呼叫。网关将返回“rlc”“当从另一端收到摘机且所有资源都已释放时。*可以在单向传入中继上发送“rel”，以释放先前发送的块（“bl”）。

contents.text: The "BL" (FXS) package is a simple line package, so does not have these events (uses "hd", "hf", and "hu" as the only hook state events).
contents.zh-CHS: “BL”（FXS）包是一个简单的行包，因此没有这些事件（使用“hd”、“hf”和“hu”作为唯一的钩子状态事件）。

contents.text: The "DO" (FXO) package, however, does have "rel" and "rlc" because in the ground-start case there is the ability to "release" the call as result of a tip-ground release. The signal "rel" is used if the PBX releases the call first (followed by S: hu from the call Agent to complete the release). Alternatively, the Call Agent can send the S: hu to initiate the release - followed by an "rlc" event from the media gateway to Call Agent when the PBX does the tip ground release. Although the loop-start trunks would not normally have this behavior (only applies to ground-start), the media gateway should emulate the behavior in the case of loop-start in order to allow the Call Agent a common interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 然而，“DO”（FXO）软件包有“rel”和“rlc”，因为在地面启动情况下，由于tip地面释放，可以“释放”呼叫。如果PBX首先释放呼叫（然后是呼叫代理发出的S:hu以完成释放），则使用信号“rel”。或者，呼叫代理可以发送S:hu以启动释放，然后在PBX进行tip地面释放时从媒体网关向呼叫代理发送“rlc”事件。虽然环路启动中继通常不会有这种行为（仅适用于地面启动），但媒体网关应在环路启动的情况下模拟这种行为，以便允许呼叫代理使用公共接口。

contents.text: 3.4. Blocking CAS Trunks
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. 阻塞CAS中继

contents.text: In addition to the above signals and events, there is the "bl" signal/event which is used for blocking one-way trunks (does not work for two way trunks) by providing a continuous off-hook.
contents.zh-CHS: 除上述信号和事件外，还有“bl”信号/事件，用于通过提供连续摘机来阻断单向中继线（不适用于双向中继线）。

contents.text: 3.5. Summary of Hook-State Events
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5. 钩子状态事件摘要

contents.text: The following summarizes the use of the various events that involve off-hook and on-hook from call establishment to tear-down. This applies mainly to "MS", "DT", "MD" and to a lesser extent the "DO" package.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面总结了各种事件的使用，这些事件涉及从呼叫建立到中断的摘机和挂机。这主要适用于“MS”、“DT”、“MD”，在较小程度上适用于“DO”包。

contents.text: * The "sup" event represents off-hook origination. * The "sup" signal with parameters provides off-hook with digit outpulsing on the terminating side. * Once outpulsing is completed, an "ans" event indicates off-hook from the termination side (the called party has answered). * The call agent can then send an "ans" signal (off-hook) to the originating end to indicate to the caller that the called party has answered. * The Call Agent can send a "rel" to either end at any time to tear down the call (e.g., to abort the call). * The media gateway can send "rel" to indicate abnormal termination of the call (with a reason as a parameter). * However, under normal operation once a call is established, the Call Agent can expect a "sus" (suspend) event from the termination end to indicate that the caller went on-hook and a "res" if the called party goes off-hook again before the Call Agent tears down the call. The Call Agent can send these same signals to the originating end to indicate off-hook and on-hook to the calling party without tearing down the call. * During normal operation, once the call is established, on-hook from the calling party (origination side) would result in a "rel" signal. The Call Agent would then normally send the "rel" signal to the terminating end to terminate the call. "rel is normally followed by "rlc" (e.g., media gateway indicates calling party on-hook with "rel" and the Call Agent responds with "rlc", which sends on on-hook back to the calling party to indicated release complete.
contents.zh-CHS: * “sup”事件表示脱钩起源。*带有参数的“sup”信号在终端侧提供数字输出的摘机。*一旦输出完成，“ans”事件表示从终端侧脱离连接（被叫方已应答）。*呼叫代理随后可以向发起端发送“ans”信号（摘机），以向呼叫者指示被叫方已应答。*呼叫代理可以随时向任意一端发送“rel”以中断呼叫（例如，中止呼叫）。*媒体网关可以发送“rel”以指示呼叫异常终止（以原因作为参数）。*然而，在呼叫建立后的正常操作下，呼叫代理可以预期来自终止端的“sus”（suspend）事件，以指示呼叫者挂机，并且如果被叫方在呼叫代理中断呼叫之前再次挂机，“res”。呼叫代理可以向发起端发送这些相同的信号，以向呼叫方指示挂机和挂机，而无需中断呼叫。*在正常操作期间，一旦呼叫建立，来自呼叫方（发起方）的挂机将产生“rel”信号。然后，呼叫代理通常会向终端发送“rel”信号以终止呼叫。“rel”后面通常跟“rlc”（例如，媒体网关用“rel”表示挂机呼叫方，呼叫代理用“rlc”响应，它将挂机发送回呼叫方，以完成指示的释放。

contents.text: The "MO" package is a bit different in that normally only the terminating side (the operator) can release the call ("rel" event). The "sus" and "res" are forward signals to the operator indicating user hook-status.
contents.zh-CHS: “MO”包有点不同，通常只有终端端（操作员）可以释放呼叫（“rel”事件）。“sus”和“res”是向操作员转发的信号，指示用户挂钩状态。

contents.text: 4.0. Glare Handling
contents.zh-CHS: 4.0. 眩光处理

contents.text: 4.1. Glare on MF Bi-directional Wink-start Trunks
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. MF双向闪烁启动中继上的眩光

contents.text: Gateways may have a configurable glare bit on a per-DS0 basis that can be set to indicate whether the gateway is the controlling or non-controlling "switch". However, in general, PBXs are either pre-configured or can be configured to behave as non-controlling switches. In this case if they see an off-hook that exceeds allowable wink length, they will attach a receiver, go on-hook, and await digits for a new call. Meanwhile the PBX will retry its original call on another trunk.
contents.zh-CHS: 网关可能具有基于每个DS0的可配置眩光位，该位可设置为指示网关是控制“交换机”还是非控制“交换机”。但是，一般来说，PBX是预配置的，或者可以配置为作为非控制交换机。在这种情况下，如果他们看到一个脱钩超过允许的眨眼长度，他们将连接一个接收器，上钩，等待新呼叫的数字。同时，PBX将在另一个中继上重试其原始呼叫。

contents.text: If the gateway behaves like a controlling switch, when glare is detected, the gateway will wait for up to some timeout value (default value of 4 seconds) until the incoming off-hook changes to an on-hook state at which time it will start out-pulsing in the normal manner. If the timeout occurs before the state change to on-hook occurs, the gateway will send a release event to the Call Agent (a "rel(44)" event - cause code indicating glare).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果网关的行为类似于控制开关，则当检测到眩光时，网关将等待某个超时值（默认值为4秒），直到传入的摘机状态变为挂机状态，此时它将以正常方式开始脉冲。如果超时发生在状态更改为on hook之前，网关将向呼叫代理发送一个释放事件（“rel（44）”事件-指示眩光的原因代码）。

contents.text: When "rel(44)" is sent by the gateway, that is an indication to the Call Agent that the call is in the process of being released and that the Call Agent should give up on that trunk. However, the gateway may not actually want to send the on-hook at that time in order to avoid the possibility that the other end takes the on-hook as a wink. Instead, it may start a second timer and wait some longer period of time (e.g., 16 seconds or so) before releasing the trunk. If it receives an on-hook prior the timeout, it completes the release by going on-hook. If, on the other hand, the timer expires before the other end goes on-hook, it will simply go on-hook and wait for the other end to go on-hook. In any case, once both ends have returned to the on-hook state, an "rlc" event is sent to the Call Agent.
contents.zh-CHS: 当网关发送“rel（44）”时，这表示呼叫代理正在释放呼叫，并且呼叫代理应该放弃该中继。然而，网关当时可能并不真正想要发送挂机，以避免另一端将挂机当作眨眼。相反，它可能会启动第二个计时器，并在释放中继之前等待更长的时间（例如，16秒左右）。如果它在超时之前收到挂机，则通过挂机完成释放。另一方面，如果计时器在另一端挂机之前过期，它将直接挂机并等待另一端挂机。在任何情况下，一旦两端都返回到挂机状态，就会向呼叫代理发送一个“rlc”事件。

contents.text: 4.2. Glare Handling - Basic PBX Trunks
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 眩光处理.基本PBX中继线

contents.text: In order to reduce the chances of glare, the gateway should try a ringing pre-trip test prior to sending ringing on a basic ground start trunk. If glare is detected on an outgoing seizure of a basic PBX trunk, the request for ringing should be "Nacked" (error code 401 - phone off-hook) to the Call Agent.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了减少眩光的机会，网关应在基本地面启动中继线上发送振铃之前尝试振铃预跳闸测试。如果在基本PBX中继线传出时检测到眩光，则应将振铃请求“Nacked”（错误代码401-电话挂断）发送给呼叫代理。

contents.text: 5.0. Example Call Flows
contents.zh-CHS: 5.0. 示例调用流

contents.text: 5.1. PBX to PBX ("MS", "DT, and "BL" packages).
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. PBX到PBX（“MS”、“DT”和“BL”包）。

contents.text: The following call flows involve a single Call Agent that handles both sides of the call (i.e., the inter-Call-Agent signaling is ignored). The components involved in the call are:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下呼叫流涉及处理呼叫双方的单个呼叫代理（即，忽略呼叫代理间信令）。该调用涉及的组件包括：

contents.text: * The Call Agent (CA)
contents.zh-CHS: * 呼叫代理（CA）

contents.text: * The originating Media Gateway (GW-o) and
contents.zh-CHS: * 始发媒体网关（GW-o）和

contents.text: * The terminating Media Gateway (GW-t)
contents.zh-CHS: * 终端媒体网关（GW-t）

contents.text: 5.1.1. Call Setup Flows
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.1. 呼叫设置流

contents.text: The following describes some PBX to PBX call. The table gives an overview of the initial part of the call flow with details to follow.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面介绍一些PBX到PBX的呼叫。该表概述了呼叫流的初始部分，并提供了后续细节。

contents.text: Step A1 PBX seizure results in a notify to the Call Agent indicating the start of a call setup:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1 PBX占用导致向呼叫代理发出通知，指示呼叫设置开始：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789AF
O: ms/sup (or dt/sup)
In the case of the "BL" package (basic PBX) the interface looks like a simplified line interface with the standard "hd" event for off-hook:
contents.zh-CHS: 在“BL”包（基本PBX）的情况下，该接口看起来像一个简化的线路接口，带有标准的“hd”事件，用于摘机：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789AF
O: bl/hd
Another alternative would have been to use an embedded request in the RQNT that resulted in this notify and combine that request with step A3. Example - "ms" package:
contents.zh-CHS: 另一种选择是在RQNT中使用导致此通知的嵌入式请求，并将该请求与步骤A3合并。示例-“ms”包：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789AF
R: ms/sup(E(R(ms/inf, ms/rel))
Step 3 could also be eliminated by the use of "loop" mode e.g.:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤3也可以通过使用“循环”模式来消除，例如：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789AF
Q:loop
R: ms/sup, ms/inf, ms/rel
This would result in both notifies occurring without requiring the RQNT in step A3.
contents.zh-CHS: 这将导致两个通知都发生，而不需要步骤A3中的RQNT。

contents.text: Step A2 The Call Agent sends an Ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理发送Ack：

contents.text: Step A3 The Call Agent requests that digits be collected. The approach used here depends on the type of PBX interface. For an MF interface the Call Agent requests that information digits be collected as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3呼叫代理请求收集数字。这里使用的方法取决于PBX接口的类型。对于MF接口，呼叫代理请求按如下方式收集信息：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
R: ms/inf, ms/rel

The Call Agent also asks to be told if the trunk gets released for some reason ("rel" event) in the process of call setup (release event may be due to some signaling error for example). For DTMF trunks (wink-start, immediate start and Basic PBX), the request is based on a digit map so looks a bit different:
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫代理还要求被告知中继线在呼叫设置过程中是否因某种原因被释放（“rel”事件）（例如，释放事件可能是由于某些信令错误）。对于DTMF中继（wink start、immediate start和Basic PBX），请求基于数字映射，因此看起来有点不同：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
R: d/[0-9*#T](D), dt/rel (bl/hd in the case of Basic PBX)

D: (xxxxxxx | x.[T#])
S: dt/dl
Note: the request to signal dial-tone may or may not be here depending on PBX interface requirement - bl/dl required for Basic PBX; dt/dl for some Immediate Start interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：根据基本PBX所需的PBX接口要求（bl/dl），此处可能会发出拨号音信号，也可能不会发出拨号音信号；一些即时启动接口的dt/dl。

contents.text: Step A4 The gateway responds with an ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4网关以ack响应：

contents.text: Step A5 Once the digits are collected the gateway notifies the call agent. In the case of an MF interface, the resulting notify will look like the following
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5收集到数字后，网关通知呼叫代理。在MF接口的情况下，生成的通知如下所示

contents.text:
NTFY 3002 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: ms/inf(k0,5,5,5,1,2,3,4,s0)
In the case of a DTMF interface (including Basic PBX), it will look like the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于DTMF接口（包括基本PBX），它将如下所示：

contents.text:
NTFY 3002 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: d/5,d/5,d/5,d/1,d/2,d/3,d/4
Step A6 The Call Agent responds with an ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6呼叫代理用ack响应：

contents.text: Step B1 The Call Agent now requests that a receive-only connection be made.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B1呼叫代理现在请求建立仅接收连接。

contents.text: CRCX 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0 C: A7453949499 L: a:PCMU,s:off,e:on M: recvonly X: 0123456789B1 R: ms/rel (or dt/rel or bl/hu).
contents.zh-CHS: CRCX 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o、 net MGCP 1.0 C:A74539499L:a:PCMU，s:off，e:on M:recvonly X:0123456789B1 R:ms/rel（或dt/rel或bl/hu）。

contents.text: Step B2 The Gateway acks with a connection ID and provides the SDP information:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B2网关确认连接ID并提供SDP信息：

contents.text: Step B3 The Call Agent passes this SDP information to the terminating gateway (GW-t) as part of the connection request:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B3呼叫代理将此SDP信息作为连接请求的一部分传递给终端网关（GW-t）：

contents.text:
CRCX 4001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A7453949499
X: 45375840
L: a:PCMU,s:off,e:on
M: sendrecv
Note that the call setup on the terminating trunk can be done with this CRCX, although in this call flow - it is shown later (step C1).
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，终接中继上的呼叫设置可以使用此CRCX完成，尽管在该呼叫流中-稍后将显示（步骤C1）。

contents.text: Step B4 The terminating gateway, responds with an ack and its SDP information:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B4：终端网关用ack及其SDP信息进行响应：

contents.text: Step B5 Call Agent sends a modify connection request with connection mode receive-only to the origination gateway and includes the SDP information with the selected profile from the termination gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B5呼叫代理使用连接模式receive only向发起网关发送修改连接请求，并包括来自终止网关的SDP信息和所选配置文件。

contents.text:
MDCX 2003 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A7453949499
I: 34738A
M: recvonly
Step B6 The Gateway Acks the modify connection request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B6网关确认修改连接请求

contents.text: The following table shows the remainder of the call flow to set up the call except for Basic PBX (Basic PBX shown in) with details to follow.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表显示了除基本PBX（中所示的基本PBX）之外设置呼叫的其余呼叫流，并提供了以下详细信息。

contents.text: Step C1 The Call Agent does a setup request to the terminating gateway The setup request for an MF PBX interface (wink start or immediate start) will be the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C1呼叫代理向终端网关发出设置请求。MF PBX接口（闪烁启动或立即启动）的设置请求如下：

contents.text:
RQNT 4002 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
Q: loop
S: ms/sup(addr(ko,5,5,5,1,2,3,4,s0))
R: ms/oc, ms/rel, ms/ans
Note that the result of the "sup" signal is the following sequence on the interface to the PBX:
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，“sup”信号的结果是PBX接口上的以下顺序：

contents.text: * off-hook -> PBX * wink -> PBX (for wink-start trunks; for immediate start this part of the sequence does is not included) * Digits sent to PBX
contents.zh-CHS: * 摘机->PBX*wink->PBX（对于wink启动中继；对于立即启动，不包括这部分序列）*发送到PBX的数字

contents.text: For DTMF PBX interface (except Basic PBX), the only difference is that the MF start and end delimiters (k0 and s0) are not included:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于DTMF PBX接口（基本PBX除外），唯一的区别是不包括MF开始和结束分隔符（k0和s0）：

contents.text:
RQNT 4002 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
Q: loop
S: dt/sup(addr(5,5,5,1,2,3,4))
R: dt/oc, dt/rel, dt/ans
Basic PBX requires ringing and ring-back instead i.e.:
contents.zh-CHS: 基本PBX需要振铃和回铃，即：

contents.text:
RQNT 4002 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
Q: loop
S: bl/rg,bl/rt@34738A
R: bl/oc,bl/hd

In this case ringback will come from the gateway and will start immediately with the signal request for rt@connectionID. It will end as soon as an event occurs (off-hook representing answer event) In the case of other PBX's, the ringback tone comes from the PBX so does not have to be generated by the gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，回响将从网关发出，并将立即开始，同时发出请求的信号rt@connectionID. 一旦发生事件（摘机表示应答事件），它将立即结束。对于其他PBX，回铃音来自PBX，因此不必由网关生成。

contents.text: Note that these requests could be done as easily at the same time as the connection request (B3) saving some post-dial delay time.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，这些请求可以在连接请求（B3）的同时轻松完成，从而节省一些拨号后延迟时间。

contents.text: Step C2 The gateway responds with an ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C2：网关以ack响应：

contents.text: Step C3 Except for the basic PBX, case (where digits are not outpulsed) when the digits have completed being sent out, the gateway will notify the fact by indicate that the operation is complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C3除了基本PBX之外，当数字已完成发送时，网关将通过指示操作已完成来通知该事实。

contents.text:
NTFY 1001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
O: ms/oc(ms/sup) (or dt/oc(dt/sup))
Step C4 The Call Agent acks the notify
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C4呼叫代理确认通知

contents.text: In the case of the BL package, steps C3 and C4 will not exist.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于BL包，步骤C3和C4将不存在。

contents.text: Step C5 When an answer is obtained from the other end (off-hook from the PBX), the gateway sends a notify to indicate:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C5当从另一端（从PBX摘机）获得应答时，网关发送通知以指示：

contents.text:
NTFY 1002 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
O: ms/ans (or dt/ans or bl/hd)
Step C6 The Call Agent acks
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C6呼叫代理确认

contents.text: Step C7 The Call Agent now sends a request to make the connection full duplex and indicates that the other end has answered the phone.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C7呼叫代理现在发送请求以使连接全双工，并指示另一端已接听电话。

contents.text:
MDCX 2004 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A7453949499
X: 45375842
I: 34738A
M: sendrecv
S: ms/ans ( or dt/ans but S: not included in the case where the
originating gateway uses the BL package)
Step C8 The Gateway acks the request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C8网关确认请求

contents.text: Step C9 The Call Agent sends a notification request to be told when the trunk to be released.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C9呼叫代理发送一个通知请求，当中继被释放时通知。

contents.text:
RQNT 4003 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375842
R: ms/rel,ms/sus (or R: dt/rel,dt/sus or R: bl/hu)
Step C10 The gateway acks the request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C10网关确认请求

contents.text: The call is now setup.
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫现在已设置好。

contents.text: 5.1.2. Call Tear-Down
Two cases are included here, one where the origination end initiates the release (section 5.1.2.1) and one where the termination end initiates the release (section 5.1.2.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 此处包括两种情况，一种是发起端开始发布（第5.1.2.1节），另一种是终止端开始发布（第5.1.2.2节）。

contents.text: 5.1.2.1. Origination End Initiates the Release
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.2.1. 发起端启动发布

contents.text: The following call flow shows an example where the origination end initiates the release for the "MS" package (similar for "DT" Package).
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的调用流显示了发起端发起“MS”包（类似于“DT”包）发布的示例。

contents.text: The same call flow for the "BL" package is shown below
contents.zh-CHS: “BL”包的相同调用流程如下所示

contents.text: Step A1 The originating user goes on-hook resulting in a Notify from the gateway to indicate that the trunk is being released (reason indicating normal release)
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1：发起用户挂机导致网关发出通知，指示中继正在释放（原因指示正常释放）

contents.text:
NTFY 3005 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375842
O: ms/rel(0) (or dt/rel(0) or bl/hu)
Step A2 The Call Agent Acks the Notify
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理确认通知

contents.text: Step A3 The Call Agent sends a request to release the trunk. (For all but Basic PBX.)
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3呼叫代理发送释放中继的请求。（适用于除基本PBX外的所有PBX。）

contents.text:
RQNT 4004 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375843
S: ms/rel (or dt/rel)
R: ms/rlc (or dt/rlc)
For the Basic PBX ("BL" package), dial-tone is played
contents.zh-CHS: 对于基本PBX（“BL”套餐），会播放拨号音

contents.text:
RQNT 4004 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375843
S: bl/dl
R: bl/hu
Step A4 The Gateways acks the request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4网关确认请求

contents.text: Step A5 The other end releases the call by going on-hook and a Notify is sent to the Call Agent to indicate that release is complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5另一端通过挂接释放呼叫，并向呼叫代理发送通知以指示释放完成。

contents.text:
NTFY 1004 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375843
O: ms/rlc (or dt/rlc)
In the case of Basic PBX, this is:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于基本PBX，这是：

contents.text:
NTFY 1004 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375843
O: bl/hu
Step A6 The Call Agent returns an Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6呼叫代理返回Ack

contents.text: Step A7 The Call Agent sends a delete connection to the originating gateway with a request to do a release complete (which results in sending on-hook to the PBX).
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A7呼叫代理向发起网关发送删除连接，并请求完成释放（这将导致向PBX发送挂机）。

contents.text:
DLCX 4005 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375844
I: 34738A
S: ms/rlc (or dt/rlc)
R: ms/sup (or dt/sup)
Or in the case of Basic PBX ("BL" package):
contents.zh-CHS: 或对于基本PBX（“BL”包）：

contents.text:
DLCX 4005 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375844
I: 34738A
R: bl/hd
Step A8 The Gateway Acks and provides performance information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A8网关确认并提供性能信息。

contents.text: Step A9 The Call Agent sends a DLCX to the terminating gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A9呼叫代理向终端网关发送DLCX。

contents.text:
DLCX 2004 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B3
I: 23474FE
R: ms/sup (or dt/sup or bl/hd)
Step A10 The gateway acks with performance information
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A10网关确认性能信息

contents.text: 5.1.2.2. Termination End Initiates the Release
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.2.2. 终止端启动释放

contents.text: The following call flow gives an example of the terminating end releasing a call for all but Basic PBX ("MS" package - "DT" package is similar).
contents.zh-CHS: 以下呼叫流给出了一个终止端为基本PBX以外的所有PBX释放呼叫的示例（“MS”包-“DT”包类似）。

contents.text: The following shows the same call flow but for Basic PBX. There is no equivalent to steps A3-A6 and A11-A12 - so these are not included.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下显示了相同的呼叫流程，但适用于基本PBX。没有与步骤A3-A6和A11-A12等效的步骤-因此不包括这些步骤。

contents.text: Step A1 An on-hook is received from the PBX. In the case of all but the "BL" package, this results in a notify with event "sus" for suspend.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1：从PBX接收挂机。对于除“BL”包以外的所有包，这将导致一个带有事件“sus”的notify，用于挂起。

contents.text: Step A2 The Call Agent returns an acknowledge
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理返回应答

contents.text: The Call Agent starts a timer at this point (typically 10 seconds). If an off-hook is received from the PBX connected to GW-t before the origination side releases, the call is continued (this would appear as a "res" event or "hd" in the case of Basic PBX interface). If the origination side goes on-hook or the timer expires, then the call is torn down.
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫代理在此点启动计时器（通常为10秒）。如果在始发端释放之前从连接到GW-t的PBX接收到摘机，则呼叫将继续（在基本PBX接口的情况下，这将显示为“res”事件或“hd”）。如果发起端挂机或计时器过期，则调用被中断。

contents.text: Note that for Basic PBX (the "BL" package), steps A3 - A6 are missing (these steps do not exist for basic PBX).
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，对于基本PBX（“BL”包），缺少步骤A3-A6（基本PBX不存在这些步骤）。

contents.text: Step A3 A "sus" signal is sent to the originating side resulting in a on-hook being sent to the originating PBX.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3将“sus”信号发送至始发侧，从而将挂机发送至始发PBX。

contents.text: Step A4 GW-o acks the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4 GW-o确认请求。

contents.text: Step A5 The Call Agent sends a request to see off-hook or resume ("res") events.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5呼叫代理发送请求以查看摘机或恢复（“res”）事件。

contents.text: Note: this depends on whether the Call Agent wants to do suspend/resume processing. If not, the Call Agent may simply send "rel" along with DLCX to both ends.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：这取决于呼叫代理是否要执行挂起/恢复处理。如果没有，呼叫代理可以简单地将“rel”与DLCX一起发送到两端。

contents.text: Step A6 GW-t acks the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6 GW-t确认请求。

contents.text: Step A7 An on-hook is received from the originating PBX resulting in a notify from GW-o with event "rel" ("hu" for Basic PBX interface).
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A7：从始发PBX接收到挂机，从而导致GW-o发出带有事件“rel”（“hu”表示基本PBX接口）的通知。

contents.text: Step A8 The Call Agent "acks"
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A8呼叫代理“确认”

contents.text: Step A9 A delete connection is sent to the terminating gateway with signal "rel" which results in on-hook being sent to the terminating PBX (except for basic PBX - where there is no such signal)
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A9使用信号“rel”将删除连接发送到终端网关，这导致钩子上的数据被发送到终端PBX（基本PBX除外，在没有此类信号的情况下）

contents.text: Step A10 GW-t acks the DLCX and provides performance information
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A10 GW-t确认DLCX并提供性能信息

contents.text: Steps A11 and A12 do not exist for the basic PBX case.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于基本PBX情况，步骤A11和A12不存在。

contents.text: Step A11 GW-t returns an "rlc" event
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A11 GW-t返回“rlc”事件

contents.text: Step A12 The Call Agent "acks" the notify
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A12呼叫代理“确认”通知

contents.text: Step A13 A delete connection is sent to the originating side (with signal "rlc" except in the case of the "BL" package).
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A13将删除连接发送到发起侧（信号为“rlc”，但“BL”包的情况除外）。

contents.text: Step A14 GW-o returns an "ack" with performance information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A14 GW-o返回带有性能信息的“确认”。

contents.text: 5.2. Example Call Flows - "DO" package
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 示例调用流-“DO”包

contents.text: 5.2.1. Call Setup Flows
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.1. 呼叫设置流

contents.text: The following describes some PBX to PBX call. The table gives an overview of the initial part of the call flow with details to follow.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面介绍一些PBX到PBX的呼叫。该表概述了呼叫流的初始部分，并提供了后续细节。

contents.text: Step A1 PBX rings results in a notify to the Call Agent indicating the start of a call setup:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1 PBX振铃会向呼叫代理发出通知，指示呼叫设置开始：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 aaln/0@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789AF
O: do/rg
Step A2 The Call Agent sends an Ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理发送Ack：

contents.text: Step B1 The Call Agent now requests that a receive-only connection be made.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B1呼叫代理现在请求建立仅接收连接。

contents.text: If the endpoint is running FXO ground-start, the call would also request detection of disconnect supervision from the PBX (R: do/rel) and should send an off-hook (S: do/hd) in response to ringing.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果端点正在运行FXO ground start（FXO接地启动），则该呼叫还将请求检测来自PBX的断开连接监控（R:do/rel），并应发送断开连接（S:do/hd）以响应振铃。

contents.text: Step B2 The Gateway acks with a connection ID and provides the SDP information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B2网关确认连接ID并提供SDP信息。

contents.text: Step B3 The Call Agent passes this SDP information to the terminating gateway (GW-t) as part of the connection request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B3呼叫代理将此SDP信息作为连接请求的一部分传递给终端网关（GW-t）。

contents.text: Step B4 The terminating gateway, responds with an ack and its SDP information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B4，终端网关用ack及其SDP信息响应。

contents.text: Step B5 Call Agent sends a modify connection request with connection mode receive-only to the origination gateway and includes the SDP information with the selected profile from the termination gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B5呼叫代理使用连接模式receive only向发起网关发送修改连接请求，并包括来自终止网关的SDP信息和所选配置文件。

contents.text: Step B6 The Gateway Acks the modify connection request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B6网关确认修改连接请求

contents.text: Step C1 The Call Agent does a setup request to the terminating gateway The setup request will be the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C1呼叫代理向终端网关发出设置请求。设置请求如下：

contents.text:
RQNT 4002 aaln/0@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
S: do/sup(addr(5,5,5,1,2,3,4))
R: do/oc
Note that the result of the "sup" signal is the following sequence on the interface to the PBX:
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，“sup”信号的结果是PBX接口上的以下顺序：

contents.text: * off-hook -> PBX * tip-ground <- PBX (for loop-start this step does not apply) * digits sent to PBX
contents.zh-CHS: * 摘机->PBX*尖端接地<-PBX（对于环路启动，此步骤不适用）*发送到PBX的数字

contents.text: Step C2 The gateway responds with an ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C2：网关以ack响应：

contents.text: Step C3 When the digits have been completely sent out, the gateway will notify the fact by indicate that the operation is complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C3当数字已完全发送时，网关将通过指示操作已完成来通知事实。

contents.text:
NTFY 1001 aaln/0@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
O: do/oc(do/sup)
Step C4 The Call Agent acks the notify
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C4呼叫代理确认通知

contents.text: Step C5 The Call Agent now sends a request to make the connection full duplex and indicates that the other end has answered the phone.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C5呼叫代理现在发送一个请求使连接全双工，并指示另一端已接听电话。

contents.text: If the endpoint is running FXO ground-start, the call would also requests detection of disconnect supervision from the PBX (R:do/rel)
contents.zh-CHS: 如果端点正在运行FXO ground start，则调用还将请求检测PBX的断开监控（R:do/rel）

contents.text: Step C6 The Gateway acks the request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C6网关确认请求

contents.text: Step C7 If the endpoint is running FXO ground-start, the Call Agent sends a notification request to be told when the trunk to be released (R: do/rel). This step and step C8 are not needed if the endpoint is running FXO loop-start.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C7如果端点正在运行FXO地面启动，则呼叫代理发送一个通知请求，告知何时释放中继（R:do/rel）。如果端点正在运行FXO loop start，则不需要此步骤和步骤C8。

contents.text: Step C8 The gateway acks the request and the call is now setup.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C8网关确认请求，呼叫现在已设置。

contents.text: 5.2.2. Call Tear-Down

If the endpoint is running FXO loop-start, the PBX cannot initiate call release. In this case, call release is always initiated by the Media Gateway by going onhook. Disconnect supervision from the PBX is provided only for FXO ground-start. However, it does not matter whether the origination end or the termination end initiates the release. The call flows for either case are the same. Therefore, only the case where the origination end initiates the release is illustrated in this section.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果端点正在运行FXO loop start，则PBX无法启动呼叫释放。在这种情况下，呼叫释放总是由媒体网关通过挂接启动。从PBX断开监控仅用于FXO接地起动。但是，发起端还是终止端发起发布并不重要。两种情况下的调用流都是相同的。因此，本节仅说明发起端发起发布的情况。

contents.text: Step A1 The originating PBX goes on-hook resulting in a Notify from the gateway to indicate that the trunk is being released (reason indicating normal release).
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1：始发PBX挂机，导致网关发出通知，指示中继正在释放（原因指示正常释放）。

contents.text:
NTFY 3005 aaln/0@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375842
O: do/rel(0)
Step A2 The Call Agent Acks the Notify
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理确认通知

contents.text: Step A3 The Call Agent sends a request to release the trunk.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3呼叫代理发送释放中继的请求。

contents.text: Step A4 The Gateways acks the request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4网关确认请求

contents.text: Step A5 PBX at the terminating end releases the call by releasing tip-ground and a Notify is then sent to the Call Agent to indicate that release is complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5终止端的PBX通过释放tip接地释放呼叫，然后向呼叫代理发送通知以指示释放完成。

contents.text: Note that there is no ground signal in case of loop-start. However, this NTFY message is still generated as soon as hu signal is applied.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，环路启动时没有接地信号。但是，只要应用hu信号，仍会生成此NTFY消息。

contents.text: Step A6 The Call Agent returns an Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6呼叫代理返回Ack

contents.text: Step A7 The Call Agent sends a delete connection to the originating gateway with a request to go onhook.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A7呼叫代理向发起网关发送删除连接，并请求挂接。

contents.text: Step A8 The Gateway Acks and provides performance information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A8网关确认并提供性能信息。

contents.text: Step A9 The Call Agent sends a DLCX to the terminating gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A9呼叫代理向终端网关发送DLCX。

contents.text: Step A10 The gateway acks with performance information
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A10网关确认性能信息

contents.text: 5.3. Example Call Setup - "MD" Package
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3. 呼叫设置示例-“MD”包

contents.text: The following describes Feature Group D call setup using the "MD" package. The table gives an overview of the initial part of the call flow with details to follow.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面介绍使用“MD”软件包的功能组D调用设置。该表概述了呼叫流的初始部分，并提供了后续细节。

contents.text: The assumption is that prior to the initial "notify", the Call Agent has sent a request to be informed of "sup" and "inf" events using quarantine handling "Q: loop".
contents.zh-CHS: 假设在初始“notify”之前，呼叫代理已经发送了一个请求，使用隔离处理“Q:loop”通知“sup”和“inf”事件。

contents.text: Step A1 Trunk seizure results in a notify to the Call Agent indicating the start of a call setup:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1中继线占用导致向呼叫代理发出通知，指示呼叫设置开始：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: md/sup
Step A2 The Call Agent sends an Ack.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理发送Ack。

contents.text: Step A3 Once the digits for the identification field are collected the gateway notifies the call agent:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3收集到标识字段的数字后，网关通知呼叫代理：

contents.text: Step A4 The Call Agent responds with an ack.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4呼叫代理用ack响应。

contents.text: Step A5 When the digits are collected for the address field, another notify is sent:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5收集地址字段的数字后，发送另一个通知：

contents.text: Step A6 The Call Agent "acks"
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6呼叫代理“确认”

contents.text: Step B1 Create connection - receive only:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B1创建连接-仅接收：

contents.text:
CRCX 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A3C47F21456789F1
L: p:10, a:PCMU
M: sendrecv
X: 0123456789B1
R: md/rel
Step B2 The Gateway "acks" the request and provides connection ID and SDP information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B2网关“确认”请求并提供连接ID和SDP信息。

contents.text: Step B3 The Call Agent passes this SDP information to the terminating gateway (GW-t) as part of the connection request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B3呼叫代理将此SDP信息作为连接请求的一部分传递给终端网关（GW-t）。

contents.text: Step B4 The terminating gateway, responds with an ack and its SDP information.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B4，终端网关用ack及其SDP信息响应。

contents.text: Step B5 Call Agent sends a modify connection request with connection mode receive-only to the origination gateway and includes the SDP information with the selected profile from the termination gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B5呼叫代理使用连接模式receive only向发起网关发送修改连接请求，并包括来自终止网关的SDP信息和所选配置文件。

contents.text: Step B6 The Gateway Acks the modify connection request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B6网关确认修改连接请求。

contents.text: In the case of EAIN signaling there is some additional information provided so that this initial part of the call setup looks slightly different:
contents.zh-CHS: 在EAIN信令的情况下，提供了一些附加信息，以便呼叫设置的初始部分看起来略有不同：

contents.text: The assumption is that prior to the initial "notify", the Call Agent has sent a request to be informed of "sup" and "inf" events using quarantine handling "Q: loop".
contents.zh-CHS: 假设在初始“notify”之前，呼叫代理已经发送了一个请求，使用隔离处理“Q:loop”通知“sup”和“inf”事件。

contents.text: Step A1 Trunk seizure results in a notify to the Call Agent indicating the start of a call setup:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1中继线占用导致向呼叫代理发出通知，指示呼叫设置开始：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: md/sup
Step A2 The Call Agent sends an Ack
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理发送Ack

contents.text: Step A3 The initial digit string contains the country address field:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3初始数字字符串包含国家/地区地址字段：

contents.text: Step A4 The Call Agent responds with an ack
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4呼叫代理用ack响应

contents.text: Step A5 The Call Agent does processing on the country address field and sends a request to initiate further input (sends a continue wink):
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5呼叫代理对国家/地区地址字段进行处理，并发送启动进一步输入的请求（发送继续闪烁）：

contents.text:
RQNT 2002 ds/*@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B1
Q: loop
R: md/inf,md/rel
S: md/cwk
Step A6 The Gateway "acks" the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6网关“确认”请求。

contents.text: Step A7 Once the digits for the identification field are collected the gateway notifies the call agent:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A7收集到标识字段的数字后，网关通知呼叫代理：

contents.text: Step A8 The Call Agent responds with an ack
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A8呼叫代理以ack响应

contents.text: Step A9 When the digits are collected for the address field, another notify is sent:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A9收集地址字段的数字后，将发送另一个通知：

contents.text: Step A10 The Call Agent "acks"
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A10呼叫代理“确认”

contents.text: Step B1 Create connection - receive only:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B1创建连接-仅接收：

contents.text:
CRCX 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A3C47F21456789F1
L: p:10, a:PCMU
M: sendrecv
X: 0123456789B1
R: md/rel
Step B2 The Gateway "acks" the request and provides connection ID and SDP information
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B2网关“确认”请求并提供连接ID和SDP信息

contents.text: Step B3 The Call Agent passes this SDP information to the terminating gateway (GW-t) as part of the connection request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B3呼叫代理将此SDP信息作为连接请求的一部分传递给终端网关（GW-t）。

contents.text: Step B4 The terminating gateway, responds with an ack and its SDP information
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B4：终端网关用ack及其SDP信息进行响应

contents.text: Step B5 Call Agent sends a modify connection request with connection mode receive-only to the origination gateway and includes the SDP information with the selected profile from the termination gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B5呼叫代理使用连接模式receive only向发起网关发送修改连接请求，并包括来自终止网关的SDP信息和所选配置文件。

contents.text: Step B6 The Gateway Acks the modify connection request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B6网关确认修改连接请求

contents.text: The following table shows the remainder of the call flow to set up the call for FGD EANA.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表显示了设置FGD EANA调用的其余调用流。

contents.text: Step C1 The Call Agent does a setup request to the terminating gateway The setup request for an MF EANA FGD interface will be the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C1呼叫代理向终端网关发出设置请求。MF EANA FGD接口的设置请求如下：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
Q: loop
S:
md/sup(ct(nda),addr(k0,5,5,5,5,2,2,1,2,3,4,s0),id(k0,0,5,5,5,1,
2,3,4,s2))
R: md/swk,md/oc,md/rel,md/awk,md/ans
Note that the result of the "sup" signal is the following sequence on the interface to the PBX:
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，“sup”信号的结果是PBX接口上的以下顺序：

contents.text: * off-hook -> SCN * wink <- SCN * caller ID digits sent to SCN * address digits sent to SCN
contents.zh-CHS: * 摘机->SCN*wink<-SCN*发送到SCN的来电显示数字*发送到SCN的地址数字

contents.text: Step C2 The gateway responds with an ack
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C2网关以ack响应

contents.text: Step C3 "Notify" the CA that the start of signaling has occurred (incoming wink start has occurred) i.e.:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C3“通知”CA信号已经开始（传入的wink启动已经发生），即：

contents.text:
NTFY 3000 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: md/swk
Step C4 The Call Agent "acks".
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C4呼叫代理“acks”。

contents.text: Step C5 "Notify" that out-pulsing is complete:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C5“通知”输出脉冲完成：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: md/oc(md/sup)
Step C6 The Call Agent "acks".
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C6呼叫代理“确认”。

contents.text: Step C7 "Notify" that the acknowledgement wink has been received:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C7“通知”已接收到确认闪烁：

contents.text:
NTFY 3002 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: md/awk
Step C8 The Call Agent "acks".
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C8呼叫代理“acks”。

contents.text: Step C9 The acknowledge wink is passed to the originating gateway:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C9：确认闪烁被传递到发起网关：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375842
S: md/awk
R: md/rel
Step C10 GW-o "acks".
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C10 GW-o“确认”。

contents.text: Step C11 "Notify" off-hook event (the person at the other end has answered):
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C11“通知”脱钩事件（另一端的人员已回答）：

contents.text:
NTFY 3003 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: md/ans
Step C12 The Call Agent "acks".
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C12呼叫代理“确认”。

contents.text: Step C13 The Call Agent now sends a request to make the connection full duplex and indicates that the other end has answered the phone (S: ans sent)
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C13呼叫代理现在发送一个请求，使连接全双工，并指示另一端已接听电话（S:ans sent）

contents.text: Step C14 The Gateway acks the request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C14网关确认请求

contents.text: In the case of FGD EAIN, there is an additional digits string (country address and/or carrier access code that has to be included so that step C1 looks like the following in a case where there is no overlapped sending:
contents.zh-CHS: 在FGD EAIN的情况下，必须包括额外的数字字符串（国家地址和/或载波接入码），以便在不存在重叠发送的情况下，步骤C1如下所示：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 45375841
Q: loop
S:md/sup(ct(nta),ca(k0,1,3,8,9,9,0,0,1,0,s0),id(k0,
0,5,5,5,1,2,3,4,s0),addr(ko,0,1,1,3,8,1,2,3,4,7,6,5,s0))
R: md/swk,md/oc,md/rel,md/awk,md/ans
If overlapped sending is done, only the country address and caller ID digit strings are sent out in step C1:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果完成了重叠发送，则在步骤C1中仅发送国家地址和呼叫者ID数字字符串：

contents.text: RQNT 2001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
Then after these digits go out indicated by event "oc(sup)" in step C5, and as soon as the Call Agent has the address information, it sends it out using the "inf" signal:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，在步骤C5中的事件“oc（sup）”指示这些数字消失之后，呼叫代理一旦获得地址信息，就使用“inf”信号将其发送出去：

contents.text:
RQNT 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@mgw45.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B1
Q: loop
R: md/oc,md/rel,md/awk,md/ans
S: md/inf(ko,0,1,1,3,8,1,2,3,4,7,6,5,s0)
The Call Agent will then get a further "md/oc(md/sup)" event when these digits have gone out.
contents.zh-CHS: 当这些数字消失时，呼叫代理将获得进一步的“md/oc（md/sup）”事件。

contents.text: Step C15 The Call Agent requests to be told of on-hook ("sus") events or abnormal release ("rel") events.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C15呼叫代理请求被告知挂机（“sus”）事件或异常释放（“rel”）事件。

contents.text: Step C16 The gateway "acks" the request.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤C16网关“确认”请求。

contents.text: 5.4. Example Call Setup - "MO" Package
contents.zh-CHS: 5.4. 呼叫设置示例-“MO”包

contents.text: The following describes Feature Group D operator services signaling call setup (911 call) using the "MO" package. The table gives an overview of the initial part of the call flow with details to follow. In this case GW-o is a residential gateway using the line package and GW-t connects to the E911 tandem.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下介绍使用“MO”软件包的功能组D操作员服务信令呼叫设置（911呼叫）。该表概述了呼叫流的初始部分，并提供了后续细节。在这种情况下，GW-o是使用线路包的住宅网关，GW-t连接到E911串联。

contents.text: Note: the originating side in this case is a line-side gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：在这种情况下，始发端是线路端网关。

contents.text: Step A1 The user goes off-hook:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A1：用户脱离钩：

contents.text:
NTFY 3001 aaln/1@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789AF
O: l/hd
Step A2 The Call Agent sends an Ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A2呼叫代理发送Ack：

contents.text: Step A3 The Call Agent sends dial-tone and requests that digits be collected:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A3呼叫代理发送拨号音并请求收集数字：

contents.text:
RQNT 2001 aaln/1@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
S: l/dl
R: d/[0-9#*T](D), hu
Step A4 The gateway responds with an ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A4网关以ack响应：

contents.text: Step A5 Once the digits are collected the gateway notifies the Call Agent. In this case, it is a 911 call
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A5收集到数字后，网关通知呼叫代理。在这种情况下，这是一个911呼叫

contents.text:
NTFY 3002 aaln/1@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
X: 0123456789B0
O: d/9,d/1,d/1
Step A6 The Call Agent responds with an ack:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤A6呼叫代理用ack响应：

contents.text: Step B1 The Call Agent now requests that a receive-only connection be made.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B1呼叫代理现在请求建立仅接收连接。

contents.text: CRCX 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0 C: A7453949499 L: a:PCMU,s:off,e:on M: recvonly X: 0123456789B1 R: l/hu.
contents.zh-CHS: CRCX 2002 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o、 net MGCP 1.0 C:A745394999 L:a:PCMU，s:off，e:on M:recvonly X:0123456789B1 R:L/hu。

contents.text: Step B2 The Gateway acks with a connection ID and provides the SDP information:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B2网关确认连接ID并提供SDP信息：

contents.text: Step B3 The Call Agent passes this SDP information to the terminating gateway (GW-t) as part of the connection request and does a call setup request at the same time:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B3呼叫代理将此SDP信息作为连接请求的一部分传递给终端网关（GW-t），同时执行呼叫设置请求：

contents.text:
CRCX 4001 ds/ds1-5/3@gw-t.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A7453949499
X: 45375840
L: a:PCMU,s:off,e:on
M: sendrecv
Q: loop
R: oc, rel, orbk
S: sup(addr(k0,9,1,1,s2),id(k0,0,8,3,4,5,6,7,8,s0))
As a result of this request, the following signaling interactions will occur between GW-t and the Switched Circuit Network (SCN - in this case, the E911 tandem):
contents.zh-CHS: 由于该请求，GW-t和交换电路网络（SCN-在本例中为E911串联）之间将发生以下信令交互：

contents.text: * Off-hook -> SCN * Wink <- SCN * k0,9,1,1,s2 -> SCN * Off-hook <- SCN * k0,0,8,3,4,5,6,7,8,s0
Note that off-hook from the SCN is part of the protocol (a request for the caller ID) and does not provide an indication of whether the operator answered or not.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，来自SCN的摘机是协议的一部分（呼叫者ID请求），不提供操作员是否应答的指示。

contents.text: Step B4 The terminating gateway, responds with an ack and its SDP information:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B4：终端网关用ack及其SDP信息进行响应：

contents.text: Step B5 The Call Agent will get a further notify when outpulsing of all of the digits is complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B5当所有数字的输出完成时，呼叫代理将获得进一步的通知。

contents.text: NTFY 3003 aaln/1@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
contents.zh-CHS: NTFY 3003 aaln/1@gw-o、 net MGCP 1.0

contents.text: Step B6 The Call Agent returns an "ack"
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B6呼叫代理返回“ack”

contents.text: Step B7 Call Agent sends a modify connection request with connection mode receive-only to the origination gateway and includes the SDP information with the selected profile from the termination gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B7呼叫代理向发起网关发送仅接收连接模式的修改连接请求，并包括来自终止网关的具有所选简档的SDP信息。

contents.text:
MDCX 2003 ds/ds1-3/6@gw-o.whatever.net MGCP 1.0
C: A7453949499
I: 34738A
M: sendrecv
Step B8 The Gateway Acks the modify connection request
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤B8网关确认修改连接请求

contents.text: The call is now established between the user and the operator.
contents.zh-CHS: 现在在用户和操作员之间建立呼叫。

contents.zh-CHS: 致谢

contents.zh-CHS: 工具书类
